_header: As I went out this ender day / Alone walking
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1988)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse Printed 1476-1558. London: Mansell, 1988, TP 171; for burden cf. 3701.
Subjects: Virgin Mary, lament of; carols, of the Passion
_description: A Planctus Marie carol — five quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Alone alone alone alone / Sore I sygh and all for one’
